hints.content:
We can think of $\purpleC{39}$ as $\purpleC{3\text{ tens}}$ and $\purpleC{9 \text{ ones}}$.  

We can think of $\blueD{60}$ as $\blueD{6\text{ tens}}$.

$\phantom{=}\purpleC{39}+\blueD{60}$

$=\purpleC{3\text{ tens}}+\purpleC{9\text{ ones}}+\blueD{6\text{ tens}}$

$= \purpleC{3\text{ tens}}+\blueD{6\text{ tens}}+\purpleC{9\text{ ones}}$

question.content:
**Which addition problem is the same as $39+60$ ?**
